mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.pm2_5 AS "pm25", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_pm2_5( id, pm2_5, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{pm25}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
